casebody.data:
HAMLET H.M.A., LLC
v.
HERNANDEZ 425A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 30, 2019 Mark L. Hayes, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Hernandez, Pedro (M.D.) William S. F. Freeman, Attorney at Law, Rebecca C. Huntington, Attorney at Law, for Hamlet H.M.A., LLC D/B/A Sandhills Regional Medical Center. Linwood Jones, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for N.C. Healthcare Association. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of April 2019 by North Carolina Healthcare Association for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of April 2019." Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). Davis, J. recused
